footer.text: Bridgeport Hotels is a division of GoTestRBLX

fields.name: Instructions:
fields.value:
1. Run ``-new [subject]``
2. You will be taken to a ticket channel where you can present your query
3. Tell the staff clearly what you need
4. When finished, a staff member will close the ticket

fields.name: Reportable Issues:
fields.value:
Moderation
Report A User
Bugs/Glitches
Other

fields.name: Rules For Sending Tickets:
fields.value:
1. Clearly state your issue & attach any files as needed
2. The server rules still apply
3. Do not go off-topic in a ticket unless you have another issue
Failure to abide by these rules will result in a blacklist from using this system
